name: Rest and Relaxation
dialogue: You've been working hard, recruit. Take a break - head south to Goldshire and visit the Lion's Pride Inn. Tell Innkeeper Farley I sent you. You've earned some rest.
completionDialogue: Ah, another brave soul sent by the Marshal! Welcome to Goldshire, friend. The inn is always open to heroes. Here, have a drink on the house!
questDialogue: Welcome to the Lion's Pride! Marshal Thornwood speaks highly of you. Rest up and enjoy the hospitality!
